value.title: IBM’s hybrid cloud strategy is gaining steam

value.title: Microsoft, HPE partner to deliver AI, edge computing on ISS

value.excerpt: Microsoft is partnering with Hewlett Packard Enterprise to bring its Azure cloud computing service to the International Space Station.
